title: System Metric Definitions and Schema
description: Defines the formal schema, expected types, and validation rules for all metrics referenced in mode transition triggers and other system configs.

runtime.failure_rate.description: Ratio of failed operations over total operations in a sliding window.

code_evolution.entropy.normalized_value.description: Estimate of code complexity/instability based on recent changes.

resource.cpu_usage.normalized.description: Average CPU utilization normalized against total available capacity.

code_evolution.revert_rate.description: Frequency of source code reverts relative to total accepted modifications.
